definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate

sentences.english: The day range inside of the forest is smaller than outside, and the light variety is more even slow.
sentences.chinese: 日较差林内小于林外，林内光照变化比较平缓。

sentences.english: The cross-shore profile of current velocity induced by irregular wave is smoother than the current induced by regular wave.
sentences.chinese: 不规则波浪作用下沿岸流的速度分布相对平缓。

sentences.english: Afterburner system is runing very smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 后燃加力系统运行平缓。

sentences.english: Northeast subordinates hills, rivers, the two sides flat terrain.
sentences.chinese: 东北部属丘陵地带，河流两岸地势平缓。

sentences.english: When the proportion was higher than 30%, values about mixed flour paste flatly changed.
sentences.chinese: 荞麦粉比例大于30%，混粉评价值变化平缓。

sentences.english: It is exquisite in carvings and gentlest to see.
sentences.chinese: 它是在精致的木雕和平缓看到的。

sentences.english: The hot air balloon rises slowly from the ground, it was more gentle and …
sentences.chinese: 热气球缓缓的从地面升起，那比想像中平缓许多。

sentences.english: The city is girdled about with gently rolling hills.
sentences.chinese: 该市为平缓起伏的丘陵所围绕著。

sentences.english: I follow the gentle downslope of Market Street toward the river.
sentences.chinese: 我顺着市场街平缓的斜坡朝着河边跑去。

sentences.english: It was a very gradual and elegant decline of the British Royal Navy.
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家海军的衰败是非常平缓和优雅的。

sentences.english: But be sure to exercise at a leisurely pace, and don't do too much too soon.
sentences.chinese: 但是运动的时候要保持平缓的节奏，不要过多过急。

sentences.english: He Kou-off after the channel mouth gradually wide, flat water.
sentences.chinese: 过合口嘴以后河槽渐宽，水流平缓。

sentences.english: It is also critical that the slope between the levels be flat and not convex or humped.
sentences.chinese: 另外，两层之间平缓不突兀也是至关重要的。

sentences.english: The city is girdled about with gently rolling hills .
sentences.chinese: 该市为平缓起伏的丘陵所围绕着。

sentences.english: Comparing with last interglacial, the climate change in Holocene is more gently.
sentences.chinese: 全新世与末次间冰期对比，总体气候变化较平缓。

definition: low and unhurried (voice etc)/low and gently sloping (terrain)
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
to move up and down/to undulate/ups and downs
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
